website_summaries.verdict: A winner for consumers seeking dark circle reduction in their 40s and upwards while also equally effective for younger people as well.
pros: Only a small amount used daily yields results within a couple of weeks and it also has a bonus of tightening sagging eye skin following weight loss
Its fresh cucumber scent is appealing
cons: A small number of consumers said this eye gel tended to congeal on their skin rather than soak in, especially when used under make up foundation

customer_reviews.title: A knock off product?
customer_reviews.text: So I used it a couple of days with no effect then I found another product which has identical ingredients to this one. Either this is a knockoff of the Eye Gel by Radha Beauty or other way around I don't know.  Check out the attached pictures for the comparison of ingredients. Here couple of other products with almost identical ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy! Terrible Product. My eyes are much worse after use.
customer_reviews.text: This product made my under eyes red and irritated. I really wanted to love this product. I really ended up hating it. It is only now after purchasing and using this product that I took the time to read the negative reviews and WOW i should have read them first. This is indeed some kind if scam. My results are the same as many many others! My eyes are much worse than they were before use. I am extremely unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I've ever put on my face ....zero stars
customer_reviews.text: This product did not fair well on my skin in the least bit. My dark circles worstened and seemed to be scarring from the red, welp like marks I would get when applying it. I tried it for 2 weeks just to make sure it wasn't just a phase and as you can see from the photos, there's a huge difference in the before and after... I just wanted to tighten and lighten.... total opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: It really does work...
customer_reviews.text: Give it time and use it religiously- this thing really works!! As a mother of 4 in her 30's, I also nanny full time for 3 additional little ones. I'm always running on minimal to no sleep, don't eat right, am always on the go... This helped actually take away the dark circles I was spending so much money on expensive makeup to conceal! Try to anyway... they always would shine through until now!! Two weeks between photos. ***This is my own opinion and I haven't received anything free, nor have I been paid for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Savage

customer_reviews.title: Did not reduce the bags under my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This gel is pleasant to the touch and does a nice job of moisture gel. However, I purchased it because I have bags under my eyes and wanted to get rid of them. I am half way through the jar and see no difference. I do not have dark circles, so I cannot comment on that aspect of this product. It is as good as, but no better than, Neutrogena Hydrogel, which is significantly less expensive. Thus, I cannot recommend this product. If results improve with the second half of the jar, I will amend this review.
customer_reviews.author: B. Eversberg

customer_reviews.title: So sad -- didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Well I've been using this twice a day for about two and a half months (Mar 30 to Jun 10) and am sad to report that the results have not been significant in my case. On the plus side it is easy to apply and some of the wrinkles have been reduced. But I wonder if the slight wrinkle reduction is a result of the twice daily massage or did it come from the cream? Actually I was hoping for some reduction in the puffiness under my eyes and for this there hasn't been any progress. Or I am too far over the hill to get any noticeable results.
customer_reviews.author: softrider

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t help at all!
customer_reviews.text: It made absolutely no difference! I bought this for my husband and he used it morning and evening, everyday. As a matter or fact I think it made the eye bags even worse! I’m posting 2 pictures of before and after. Don’t waste you money!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look less tired
customer_reviews.text: As a guy I can be somewhat hesitant about trying out new beauty products but after reading the reviews I thought it'd be worth a shot. Looking at some of my pictures I noticed how tired I was looking and I decided maybe I can reduce some of the puffiness around my eyes. After reading the reviews and seeing some of the photos of the results people have had I thought it'd be worth to give it a shot. After just one use my colleagues at work noticed and said it looks like I've finally gotten some rest or that it looks like maybe I've fallen in love. Yes I have fallen in love, with Baebody Eyegel
customer_reviews.author: Damian Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Itchy, burning eyes
customer_reviews.text: I had used this for only a couple of days and nights—and only on my undereyes, not even on my eyelids—when I noticed an increasing burning sensation and itchy, watery eyes. I immediately stopped using it, but it took almost a week for the puffiness and redness to recede. To be clear: my SKIN wasn't having this reaction, it was my actual EYES. I admit I may have sensitive eyes to begin with, but I definitely didn't get this gel into my eyes or even close, and I have never had such a reaction from a beauty product.
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: This gel actually works! I use under my eye ...
customer_reviews.text: This gel actually works! I use under my eye, on my eye lid and also where crows feet would be. The picture is day 1, day 5 and day 9. I've obly been using this for a little over a week and can see a dramatic difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: My new go to
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical even after reading reviews. But I have to say I see a difference after just one week. My skin doesn't seem dry at all and I use it twice a day. Great product!! Photos attached exactly one week on left, and today's after using for a week.
customer_reviews.author: eugenia beltran

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work do not buy it, read for a home recipe that works.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was such a let down. I hate products like these with thousands of reviews that just don't seem real to me and the negative reviews seem like honest reviews but you just want to believe all the positive ones. After 2 months of using this I can tell you IT DOES NOT WORK, not for wrinkles DEFINITELY NOT BLACK CIRCLES. I made my own home remedy after researching online, 1 small glob of aloe vera (100% pure), 2 drops Vitamin K (from a softgel), 2 drops of licorice extract. This home mix actually did work. Don't believe the bs reviews, let's see if they refund my money like they said they would.
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: I've only been using this product for 8 days and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for 8 days and am already seeing results. I will definitely keep up the 2x a day regimen and plan to buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hunsucker

customer_reviews.title: I'm completely in love! It actually works and some days I look ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at my eye bags one day and I wondered if I was ill or something. At age 52 I have been on a 2 year search for something to repair the damage I likely did in the sun when I was younger.After 30 days of this Eye Gel, I'm completely in love! It actually works and some days I look in the mirror at 10x magnification and am pleasantly surprised...it's like a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: The same product except cheaper and doesn’t have as good of reviews ..
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it long enough to really know how well it works, but, after accidentally ordering a different item, I realized they’re the same exact thing. The name is different but the product is the same. The ingredients were the same. The reviews for this one is awesome and the other one alright. Just confused. Also the prices differ about $7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pack your bags
customer_reviews.text: I returned this after one week because after using it twice daily there was no visible effect. The really heavy bags under my eyes are very much still there.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY ~ COMPLETE SHAM
customer_reviews.text: *MINUS 5 STARS. It does the complete reverse, making the surface areas darker and puffier, within a few minutes of application. Suffice to say: This product DOES NOT WORK! The generated reviews are clearly a sham. They’re obviously NOT reviews based on verified purchases... Consequently, the authenticity of the so-called “5-star” reviews should be investigated by the relevant authorities, as it negatively impacts the integrity of other products worthy of legitimate 4/5 star reviews! Please don’t waste your money here...
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This eye cream is amazing! The results I see after 18 days are impressive. I use it all over my face as well. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: HARD PASS - does nothing.
customer_reviews.text: This has done absolutely nothing for me. In fact, my eyes look much worse now than before. I don't think it caused the increased puffiness and wrinkles. I just think I'm at that age , but this definitely did not prevent further deterioration or improve the situation. Would absolutely NOT buy again. A whole lot of hype and no results. I have very dry skin and it is not moisturizing. I had slight dark circles forming, after using this for several months, they are now craters - with a little puffiness thrown in. This smells, feels and works like cucumber-scented water. USELESS.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: but hopefully with continued use they will get better. I love the cooling sensation after it is ...
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use (using once in the morning and once at night), the puffiness under my eyes is almost gone. The circles are still slightly discolored, but hopefully with continued use they will get better. I love the cooling sensation after it is applied and it has definitely helped firm the area.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Allen

customer_reviews.title: A realistic improvement
customer_reviews.text: After using for several weeks, the puffiness under my eyes and on my eylids was definitely reduced. I use it every morning and night. It doesn't make the puffiness totally disappear, just lessens it, which is more than any other thing I've tried. I can tell the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn DumondTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula!
customer_reviews.text: So this is my secone bottle of Baebody’s eye gel. After using the first bottle i was inclined to buy the second one as it did wonders for my eye bags and dark circles. However as soon as i opened the second bottle i knew they had changed something in it. The smell was different and it was more liquidy than before. However i wanted to give it atleast a month before writing a review and i have not seen any improvement applying daily for more than a month. My dark circles are back and this is just a waste. Need the old formula back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Am I the only one?
customer_reviews.text: At first seemed to be ok... but after about 1 week of use my under eye area became "extremely wrinkled" I looked like I aged 10 years over night! Tightness and big time increased wrinkles. I was excited about all the good reviews, however this did not work for me and was very damaging to my under eye area... hoping if I stop use my skin will return to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me at all...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to all of the phenomenal reviews on Amazon. Unfortunately, this has done nothing to reduce the puffiness under my eyes. I have used the product 2x per day for a month... and nothing. There is absolutely no change at all.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict:-)

customer_reviews.title: Don't understand the hype
customer_reviews.text: It seems the gel stays on top of the skin, it doesn't seem to be absorbed. So the skin under my eyes continued to be dry and became even dryer, since I was only using this for a while. So I will definitely not buy / use this again, since my eyes need moisture and also it feels very annoying with the product staying on top of your skin: it is easily rubbed into the eyes. This doesn't sting, but is also not very pleasant. Nope, don't understand the hype.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Great Anti-Aging Formula
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 jars of this and can't go a day without putting it on morning and night. I'm in my late 30's and people constantly tell me I look 10-20 yrs younger. I used to having drooping eyelids and that wrinkle across my neck, plus fine lines and textured skin. I started using this product 3 months ago, and I wish I had taken before pics. It's not an overnight fix, but with time and consistent use, I noticed a big difference. I have actually stopped having to wear heavy make up everyday. Most days I just put this on with some mascara and lip color, and go. Life changing.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Picture is after night/morning application for 16 days. Noticable ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is after night/morning application for 16 days. Noticable difference in dark spots and darkness overall. Will continue using. Left pic is after 15 day use and right pic is before using.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Like every other eye cream I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Like every other eye cream I've tried, does the opposite of what it's supposed to do. I'm not saying it won't work for you, as it seems to have worked for a lot of people (based on the pictures) but for me, someone with sensitive skin, it made my under eye MORE puffy and irritated than anything. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a moisturizing primer or overnight repair product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for quite a while (have gone through 3 containers of it). I honestly haven't seen anything miraculous regarding my dark undereyes but I think it has done a bit of improvement. Why it got 5 stars is because it is a great moisturizer and I use it all over my face, not just under my eyes. It is also great as a primer. Leaves the skin slightly tacky to perfectly receive any BB cream or foundation. The smell is pretty bland and organic smelling- no harsh perfumes going on your face. I think its a great product and will continue to use as my skin continues to change over time.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I am always skeptical when I read how wonderful eye gel products are and I have a cabinet full of jars that didn't quite do what they promised. I must say that I have been using Baebody for a few weeks now and am delightfully surprised!! I really have noticed a big improvement in the puffiness under my eyes- I will definitely buy this product again- it WORKS!!
customer_reviews.author: life2great

customer_reviews.title: Optimistically Tried
customer_reviews.text: I've always had dark circles and puffiness my entire life, I even generously passed it onto my children. I was unrealistically hoping for a miracle, but after months of using this product, I don't see any difference. It's sticky and leaves my skin looking shiny, which makes my dark circles and puff more obvious if I don't cover my entire face with it. Beyond the return window for me, unfortunately, because I tried to give it an honest chance to work, but my normal, less shiny/sticky, face lotion seems to do better things for my skin than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: sticky goo
customer_reviews.text: So...i thought I would like this dispenser for a quicker application process, but it's not so pleasant. The gel texture builds up all crusty and nasty and it's nearly impossible to wipe it all out. imagine how much bacteria is inside the hole (gross!) As fast as the product itself I felt like zero results. So it was more of a gel than a cream, okay. But why did my skin feel stiff and shiny like a facial peel? I kept trying but had to use other eye cream in mornings because eye makeup doesn't blend well with this sticky goo. No wrinkle improvement .Ater a couple of weeks I just threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: hweekes561

customer_reviews.title: Another bogus product to steal our money!
customer_reviews.text: Did not do anything at all. You can see after using it twice a day for almost three weeks there is absolutely no improvement to my dark under eye area. Another bogus product to steal our money.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Phelan

customer_reviews.title: It really does work wow
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Baebody Eye Gel for 10 days. I admit I was skeptical but pictures don't lie, just look at the before and after, WOW!! I have already recommended to my sister and sister in law. Cant wait for the results with future use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS EYE CREAM
customer_reviews.text: I certainly did not receive the “same” eye cream that these great reviews rave about. Either I received a “fake” product or these reviews are “fake”. The gel is sticky and feels horrible on the skin. It actually irritated my eyes. It made my dark circles look darker & made my eyes puffier. Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: SherryLynne1

customer_reviews.title: Changed the formula!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first jar of Baebody Eye Gel I ordered and it worked amazingly well. I ordered a 2nd and it didn't work at all (which is the one currently available). When I compared ingredients I found that the first jar contained stem cells, but not the second. This may be the reason that my puffiness and bags not reduced. I would like some comment from the manufacturer and wonder if others found this to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Waterlily

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: I used the gel regularly morning and evening for a couple of months, and honestly, I couldn’t tell any difference. After a while it stung when I put it on, so I quit. I guess there’s no gel in the world that can combat years of sleeplessness and stress <sigh>
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Was really happy with the results I got. I didn't expect a miracle for $25 but the other reviews led me to purchase. The bottom picture was taken February 16 and the top picture taken February 27. I used twice daily and will continue to use. Just for reference I'm 37, no kids, big believer in plenty of sleep, eating healthy and exercising. I had just had major surgery on January 23rd and was on medical leave...so was looking and feeling a little rough when first picture was taken. Splurged on this product as a pick me up. For $25 I'll buy again and continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Alert! Do a patch test 1st
customer_reviews.text: I liked the texture & the price. Seconds after putting it on under my eyes, top of my cheeks & my forehead, my skin burned..like a sunburn. I’m treating it with burn cream. Where there is a disclaimer about possible reactions to the acids used, I used my hand as a tester..no reaction. The skin on my hand is not the same as on your face. If you do you have sensitive skin, do a little patch test on your face first. It might save you a lot of pain.
customer_reviews.author: B-ann

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend the product
customer_reviews.text: What makes a product good? Consistency in quality and properties. This product lacks both. I placed two orders within 2-3 months. And both orders are really different. Even the package is different. They are styled similar but with subtle differences. Which makes me think they came from different manufactures. It would be okay but gels in both orders are absolutely different. They even smell differently and have different viscosity. I don't think this product is a knockoff but it's not worth $20+ (may be $5 is the right price). At least I couldn't see any positive result after using it. And I am really afraid of buying it again since I don't know what to expect to arrive next time.
customer_reviews.author: FriendlyX

customer_reviews.title: wow-this realy works
customer_reviews.text: I have spent thousands over the years on face cream that doesn't work just to throw it away after a few weeks. I started to notice my face just looking better. I have saggy dark circles under my eyes and it has tightened it up. It looks like I just came back from vacation after only 4 days. I look rested and the circles are almost gone. Ive had several friends ask why I look so good and its that noticeable. I'm giving this stuff out as presents now..lol The texture is very nice and it dries farely quickly so you can put makeup on pretty fast. love it!
customer_reviews.author: tina manatrakoon

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with dark circles and baggy eyes for years now, but recently they've started looking particularly bad. I'm only 28, but I guess no age is too early to start taking care of your skin. After careful research, I decided on Baebody Eye Gel to try to make things better. Within a few days, I noticed a world of difference. Not only do my eyes look a million times better, this cream feels very refreshing afterwards. My self confidence is much higher and I would absolutely recommend this to anyone doing comparative shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Swinburne

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I read about this product on Daily Mail on line. I read so many reviews and was very encouraged by what customers were saying. I purchased it over a month and a half ago and have used it twice a day. It feels very soothing when I apply it. However, it has made absolutely no difference with fine lines or eye puffiness. I get one facial per month and during my last facial I was told that my skin was very dry. That has never been an issue until I started using this product. I was really hoping for some results but no luck. I have no intentions of purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kujo

customer_reviews.title: Go to bed with Dark Circles, Wake up and they're gone!
customer_reviews.text: I'm all for a product that shows results as soon as I wake up! If I use it every night the dark circles are gone by morning. I'm black, so my dark circles get darker than my skin tone, and it ages me ugh. But this stuff makes it physically disappear! Bought this July 2018, and its November 23 2019, and I'm FINALLY buying another bottle. This stuff is a miracle product!
customer_reviews.author: Deonna Monique

customer_reviews.title: The lid broke pretty quick. Photo on the left is my first ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this so far. It's helped with my dark bags under my eyes. The lid broke pretty quick. Photo on the left is my first day using baebody. Photo on the right is almost one month later
customer_reviews.author: Jaime S

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was born with dark circles under my eyes, so I have no expectations that a product is going to do away with them. And this one hasn't. But what is has done is make my eye area look younger and healthier. After only two weeks of use I can definitely tell a difference. My eye area is smoother, brighter, and just has a younger glow. I'm pleased with the results so far. I bought this product on my own, used it, and wrote a review. No one asked me to or offered me anything in return. I'm just a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen @ TingsMom

customer_reviews.title: Misleading jar size. See photos
customer_reviews.text: The eye gel feel good, and seem to help with wrinkles but did nothing for dark circles. The vendor may have said how much was in the jar, but the jar design is very deceiving as you can see from the pictures only the top half inch of the jar has product and the rest of it is open space with an inside inner shelf. You can see from the Burts bees lip balm that only the Of the lip balm is the depth of the actual jar.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: A Dermatologist from UCSF said to not waste your money on products like this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and had no luck with it. A Dermatologist from UCSF said to not waste your money on products like this. I'm sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Seabusicut

customer_reviews.title: Not hygienic
customer_reviews.text: Once I started using this product, I started getting styes in both eyes. I didn't immediately connect the stye to this gel but after numerous stye occurrencces, and trips to the urgent care, I stopped using this gel and never got another stye. The gel smells a bit "off" - not pleasant. I believe it is not sanitary. If I could return the product to Amazon, I would. But, I think too much time has passed. I didn't realize the impact of this product until too late. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura N

customer_reviews.title: NOT the miracle cure for under eye bags.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product because of all of the positive reviews. However I've been using it religiously twice a day for almost a month now and there is absolutely no difference in the bags under my eyes. Still smells great and seems like a decent product, but I probably will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Soderlund

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.. yes it does work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried them all. Not only does this product work, but it’s also very moderately priced compared to similar products that claim to do the same thing. I’ve been using the product for a solid week.. applying twice a day. There is a noticeable difference in one week.. even my husband agrees and he is usually very critical of these sort of products. This is also an American owned company.. double bonus! I have seen a reduction in those little wrinkles that bunch up right under the eye, firmness in the whole undereye area and a reduction is the dark circles. I’m very pleased and will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Tierney

customer_reviews.title: It works but it is not a cure.
customer_reviews.text: I have some kind of allergy that makes my eyelids swell up. Allergy pills help but not that much. This product works at reducing the swelling -consistently. The main reason I am giving it a 4 instead of a 5 is because not all the swelling goes away everyday ... just most of it and because the minute I stop using it ... the swelling comes rushing back in full force. I want it to be a cure, I guess. Also I am not thrilled with the packaging. I would like a better designed container. The lid is ill fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: No more puffy eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, and for the whole face, not just the eyes. When I wake up in the morning I use it, and my makeup looks flawless. Using it at night also, and I wake up with no more puffy eyes. My skin seems more pink and healthy looking. Small lines around my eyes are practically gone. It doesn't make my eyes tear at all. I'm 51years old, smoked for a long time. It pays to always wash off your make up and use a night time cream. I'm sticking with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Terri D.

customer_reviews.title: I love how the dispenser on the product is set up
customer_reviews.text: I love how the dispenser on the product is set up, it's easy to use and get the perfect amount of product. I've been using it almost a month and haven't noticed a difference - in fact, I feel like my almost 30 year old face is looking more wrinkled under my eyes since using this. I know there isn't a cure-all and wrinkles happen, but I may have to continue my search for an eye cream that will soften some of the smile/fine line wrinkles that are becoming more apparent around my eyes. Maybe my expectations were too high....
customer_reviews.author: NJS

customer_reviews.title: Does work
customer_reviews.text: I do feel a difference regarding the tightness around my eyes without the stinging sensation that some eye creams can have. When i dispense with one push, i feel like i get too much. I have to do a tiny sub push and even then it’s not clean when I swipe it. For the price, it is worth it compared to more expensive creams. I’ve purchased this twice now and it usually lasts me months each time. I don’t think it gets rid of fine lines but probably helps prevent it . It does feel a bit stiff in the areas you apply.
customer_reviews.author: HufflepuffMom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I tried this due to the great reviews, but I followed the directions and used it for about 2.5 months with no improvement. All it did was make the skin sticky and gross feeling. I like the dispenser and how it doesn't take a whole lot of product to cover the under eye. It's a cool gel, which was comforting. I would probably have continued to use it for that alone when my eyes are feeling irritated, but it being sticky was too much for me to get over.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: False hope/does not work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 9/10/17 due to reviews written. The product did not reduce under eye puffiness or bags as listed on the product. False advertisements should be illegal and not tolerated but it all about the money. You will be wasting your money. The developer of the product does not know the meaning of under eye puffiness/bags when they say this product works on under eye puffiness/bags
customer_reviews.author: JessDee

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something Else
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT waste your money! I used this religiously and it did NOT help with my dark circle. It's a good moisturizer but do yourself a favor and increase your water intake instead. It's much cheaper and it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected for $20
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new mom and developed dark rings and puffiness from the continuous lack of sleep and long nights. I'm seeing a decrease in my puffiness and dark rings in just a week. And, to my surprise i'm also seeing a drastic improvement in my spider vein cherry that's been in my under eye area for years (its reduced in size and redness quite a bit). Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Elicia Carr

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Though I was only able to use this product for a week, I noticed no difference. I had to stop using the product when I ended up in urgent care due to the hives I got. I went from urgent care to the dermatologist for a second opinion and even the dermatologists said they'd never seen hives develop this way. I broke out around my eyes after about a week, then it spread to my forehead. I do not recommend this for anyone with any skin sensitivity (I don't even consider myself as having sensitive skin nor have I ever had a reaction to any skin or makeup products until now)...
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Powers

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try out this eye cream due to the amount of good ratings . The pictures are definitely edited to look like people's eye bags and darkness improved through blemish control. My under eyes get really sticky after applying this product and nothing has changed with my eye bags and darkness. Going to see if I can return this due to how upset I am with these results take your money else where , I'm going to try olay more reliable and well known.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and clogs pores
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product after reading the positive reviews but it simply doesn't work for me. It is sticky and takes a while to absorb into my skin and therefore has been clogging my pores. I am bummed because it is a bit pricey and unfortunately just didn't work for my skin type!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Read "Questions" sectioon before buying this  product I found useless
customer_reviews.text: Allowed a year for product to "do as advertised." A lot of chemicals, no results. In fact, does nothing patting water on eyes or cheap moisturizer doesn't do for eye area. Note above in questions: Although jar label says "Made in USA." product is actually "Made in China." Amazon apparently sees no problem with this fraud, or the above answer is erroneous, or Amazon does not vet its vendors. In any case I suggest you do not waste your money or time on "Eye Gel."
customer_reviews.author: I.D.C.

customer_reviews.title: I like the cooling effect it has whenever I apply it
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using this product and i haven't really noticed a big difference in my dark circles. But, I like the cooling effect it has whenever I apply it. I will update my review once i finish this container. Update: Unfortunately after 5 weeks of using this product, my dark circles haven't improved. In fact, I believe the fine lines under my eyes got worse. And I got rashes under my right eye. Alas, the search for an effective eye cream continues.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: 1st week of using nice gel I'm hopeful
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about this gel yet I accidentally bought the cream form last time and can't say it held up to the (company) hype but I'm hopeful about this product (used just under a week) it has a ton of good reviews so we'll see. I can say it goes on quite nicely doesn't feel greasy after drying or like much of anything but a good moisturizer. My hope is it will at least slightly diminish the darkness under my eyes. I know that's asking a lot but these eye creams/gels make that claim so hopefully I will find the one.doesn't interfere with make up application either
customer_reviews.author: Gwenpenn

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Eye Gel regularly for almost two months now and have decided it was time to leave my impressions. I'm very pleased with the product. I can honestly say I've noticed lightening under my eyes where there was darkening and slight firming around the eyes themselves. It's not a drastic change, more gradual. Of course, this is a huge improvement over other products I've tried where I really saw no change at all. So anyway, I've gotten another container and plan to continue use (after two months, I still have some left in the original jar, but want to be prepared). Perhaps I'll give an update in a few more months...
customer_reviews.author: R Bing

customer_reviews.title: Made my bags look even worse :(
customer_reviews.text: I really hoped to have the fantastic results everyone else seems to have had, but this product made the bags under my eyes look more predominant and worse overall. I've been using it morning and night, exactly as directed, for about three weeks. I thought only I noticed the dark circles under my eyes, but my coworkers have actually asked if I'm getting enough sleep...that's how bad they now look. I'm not sure if my skin just didn't react well with the ingredients or what, but very disappointed that I wasted my money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Helps tighten around eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product!! I use it at night and the next day I get compliments!! It makes my skin look great and helps tighten around my eyes!! I may skip a day in between uses if I start feeling dry, but it is a miracle eye product. I rely on honest reviews for all of my skin care so I only review the ones that are great. I am 52 years old and my eyes started getting loose skin on my upper and lower eye lids. I use a little on my laugh lines also. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No result noticed  - fake reviews?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased even after reading the reviews. I'm not impressed. I have not seen any difference. Shortly after receiving the product there was a news (channel 5) report about fake reviews on Amazon to get you to buy a product. After thinking about this I was reminded of the reviews for this product and the grammatical errors in them. I will NOT be buying any product with reviews that seem translated or not written correctly. I believe them to be seller inspired to get you to buy their products. In summary-find another eye cream this one does not live up to its reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Loizzi

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: I am feeling very disappointed. My Baebody eye gel is very sticky and takes awhile to dry. I don’t even think it is soaking in, just sits on top of my skin all sticky. When I dispensed the product it looked ok but after applying I believe I got a “false” product or very bad batch. There are so many good reviews so that lead me to purchase. What a waste of money for me. Gave it to my mom to try and she was equally disappointed. Same thing, sticky and sits on top of the skin. Trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I had to switch from waterproof mascara to regular (lash lift). The usual creamy eye moisturizers really encourage Raccoon Eyes. This gel does the hydrating thing, but if you let it soak in before eye makeup, all is good. No mascara smudging. I'd smear it all over my face, twice a day, but price. The pump thingy is interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Zillabreeze

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE don't buy into the enticing reviews. I used it every day and literally nothing changed, no exaggeration. Same thin sunken dark eye-circles, wrinkles, etc. No change at all. I felt like I just didn't use a single thing that whole time haha. Even when I didn't put a lot of product on, the next day it would be tight and peeling off, especially if I put makeup on overtop!! The container is also very, very cheaply made: the pump expels far too much product, and the lid isn't good so it always dried out by the next day. The silver flakes came off into my hand! This makes me never want to try a new product again haha.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: but there are several things about Baebody Eye Gel I really like. First of all
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for a short time, but there are several things about Baebody Eye Gel I really like. First of all, I like that it's more natural than many of the eye and face products on the market. Also, I love that it can be used all over the face, is a gel rather than a cream which often leave my face feeling greasy and is very reasonably priced. I'm 67 yrs. old so I don't expect any miracles, but it seems to have made some improvement in puffiness around my eyes and my skin feels a little firmer.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen G.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a female in my mid-twenties and bought this cream because I have dark circles under my eyes and often get asked if I am tired. The cream did not lighten my dark circles despite regular use and if I applied too much caused a light stinging sensation so personally I would not recommend but I am sure that it works for some.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: ... i have not i also will never order anything like this again iam so disappointed in Amazon for even ...
customer_reviews.text: I really thought by now i would see improvement but i have not i also will never order anything like this again iam so disappointed in Amazon for even wanting to back this product it sucks do not order this it doesnt work. i buy from amazon by weekly. shame on you amazon I also would like my money back from the barbody
customer_reviews.author: Karen McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Soothing & Absorbs Nicely
customer_reviews.text: This eye gel absorbs really nicely into the skin (I have oily skin), and is soothing under the eye. I keep my jar in the refrigerator (to help decrease the bags under my eyes). I love the dispenser that allows you to dispense a little at a time. I bought this eye gel for under eye bags as far as reducing bags under the eyes meh.....It does help diminish the bags, but I wouldn't say it eliminates the bags. I definitely think the product is priced reasonably. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: brynda004

customer_reviews.title: Some folks might like it, just didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to work but I did not notice any difference. Tried it twice a day for approx 60 days. Left a film that felt sticky; if I smiled my skin would stick together. Hours later when I washed my face I could feel a film on my skin that I would wash off. I guess I was expecting an advanced moisturizer not something that felt like glue. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: T Meredith

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying to get rid of my under eye bags, I was thrilled when I read the reviews for this product. I finally had hope that a product could diminish my dark circles & fine lines. However, after consistent use (2 times a day— at morning and at night) for over a month, there has been NO progress in the reduction of my dark circles & under eye bags! I have actually had more people asking me if I am tired since using the product. I’m not sure why this is happening but I am definitely not having the experience shared by many of the people commenting. I am overall very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, smells good
customer_reviews.text: My use of this product is relatively new so I can't speak to long-term results. However, I love the way this product feels on my face. I actually use it on my entire face rather than just around my eyes. It's a cool gel with the slight fragrance of cucumber. My skin immediately feels slightly "tighter". I've only been using it in the AM under my make-up but am considering using it at night too after reading some other reviews. Also, the way the gel is dispensed is quite neat. You press down on the top and the proper amount is released. Cuts down on wasted product! I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: BJP

customer_reviews.title: Burns!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the worse thing I ever bought on Amazon. With all the glowing reviews, I thought this would be a worthwhile purchase. After about a week and a half of continued use, I noticed severe wrinkling and flaking skin under my eyes. Instead of helping me look better, I looked like I aged ten years overnight! It has been about 3 weeks since I stopped using it and the skin is still flaking and it still looks more wrinkled than it did before I started using Baebody eye gel. This experience will make me think twice before ordering any kind of beauty product from Amazon in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I have purchased multiple times now. I have tried other under eye products and this is my favorite! Here’s why: No strong scent Easy to dispense Absorbs quickly 1 jar lasts 2-3 months (used twice daily) Noticeable effects - I am 28 years old and I do not have any under eye issues, but after dabbing this eye gel under my eyes, the skin is noticeably more plump and full looking. Sensitive skin - I do not have overly sensitive skin and this product does give me a brief tingling sensation after applying. The tingling is barely noticeable to me, but it might be uncomfortable for those with really sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer for my sensitive eye area
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait longer to leave a review as I've only used the product for about a week. No huge noticeable difference in the appearance of fine lines when i smile or squint but as a moisturizer, it's been great. I have very sensitive eyes and most products burn or cause my eyes to water, including most makeups and sunscreens, but not this product. I will keep using it and update my review if anything changes drastically. Love the easy to use container! Ps- i did NOT get this product for free and paid $23.95 for it!
customer_reviews.author: chark

customer_reviews.title: Average, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I am 30 with pretty average to somewhat dry skin, and some very fine wrinkles under my eyes have popped up over the past few years. I've used this twice daily for a few months now, and I haven't noticed any reduction in eye wrinkles or puffiness. It's not bad, better than nothing, but I don't think it's any better than the $9 drugstore-brand eye cream I was using previously. It's not creamy at all, but it is the exact appearance and texture of semen, which weirds me out. I'll be trying something else out next.
customer_reviews.author: carof

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this...
customer_reviews.text: Saw the reviews and was hopeful! I gave it a shot for a solid month, and used it every day, twice a day by the book. Just didn’t do anything for me. Three stars for ease of return, which is rare for cosmetic items on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work! Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cream because of all the rave reviews, but like most things that are cheap, you get what you pay for. My eyes are just as puffy in the morning as they were when I started using this stuff two and a half months ago. The cream burns some when applied after showering, and honestly, I think it’s drying out my skin. I wouldn’t buy this again, nor would I recommend it to anyone else. I’m beginning to think that Amazon is becoming nothing more than spam reviews. Seems to happening on a lot of seemingly popular items lately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing find
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try against Olay deep hydrating eye gel with hyaluronic acid, and I was amazed. I used the Baebody for a week, and the Olay for a week, and the Baebody was equal to the Olay, but the Baebody gives you more product for the money, and I loved how easy it was to dispense by pushing out only what you need. The olay you have to access in open jar, and it's small and easy to drop and waste product. I really like this Baebody eye gel.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it works!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several products, I found Loreal Revitalift Double Lifting worked Ok for about a year, but then was just not doing the trick anymore. I took a chance on this product after reading reviews on several forums. Holy crap! It's Day 2 and already there is a profound improvement to my near-constant puffiness (I was using Garnier's Clearly Brighter which in comparison, somewhat worked), my crow's feet have softened and I just look on an overall more awake than I usually do. This endorsement probably sounds like spam, but it really isn't. I am loving this product, and will start experimenting with their line to see if it holds up across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Karmic Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Save the land fills!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not seeing any significant result. Its OK. Nothing dramatic from oil of olay eye serum. I got this for a good price and am trying it out. My biggest problem is the dispenser. There is so much packaging here it is not only a tremendous waste and must add cost to this product, but its also the kind of pump that when you run out, its OUT. You cannot see into the bottle and the bottle is so heavy that you cant feel if its getting empty. One day, you'll just be out. Save the Landfills Baebody!! Over the top!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love how gel is dispersed
customer_reviews.text: Love how gel is dispersed, but no difference. I did leave an original post we ran I felt I saw a difference. I decided to leave the post when I received an email telling me I did receive a free jar if I left comments. I don't normally leave comments. It has been months since I've been using it and truthfully, I see no difference. Also, received no free jar! I have gone back to Lancome
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: When I tried it I was beyond disappointed. I've never used an eye product that made ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was really excited about this product. When I tried it I was beyond disappointed. I've never used an eye product that made me look more tired and aged; exactly the opposite of the goal I was trying to achieve. The gel was sticky and uncomfortable and difficult to use with other products or makeup. The stickiness of the product made any wrinkles I had appear magnified! After trying it for a brief period to see if there were any positive results, I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kennelly

customer_reviews.title: In the Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: With the incredible reviews, I knew this was the answer to my dark circles and bags! Nope. It was awful. I never throw products away; continuing to give them another chance. Every time I put this under my eyes, it felt like glue. It literally made the skin around my eyes feel stiff and sticky. I would lie down on my pillow and my delicate skin around my eyes would stick to the pillowcase! I tried to mix it with a moisturizer but then it felt like it was on fire. Tried other moisturizers and got the same burning results. Straight in the garbage can!
customer_reviews.author: Coby's Corner

customer_reviews.title: No difference after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I realize in order to get results, we sometimes have to spend good money on these products. However, dropping a total of $75 on a 3-month supply of this gel was a waste. I read all the glowing reviews and was really hopeful that this product would reduce the dark circles under my eyes. I faithfully applied the gel as instructed consistency twice daily to no avail. Please don’t waste your hard earned money on a gel that is akin to...essentially just a subtle moisturizing thick water substance. I’m very disappointed. Back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice cream to try..
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the eye gel for a week now. I haven't seen a difference yet unlike other reviews. I use it twice a day like recommended. The container it comes in has a push top. It's a nice touch. Although, I don't understand how it'll work once the cream starts getting low. It'll be where I'll have to unscrew the top to access the cream. Not a big deal since that's what most containers make you do. I deal with hereditary under eye dark circles and I've tried countless of different eye creams. Based on the reviews, I decided to try this one. I will keep using it and hopefully see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse

customer_reviews.title: Effective and affordable
customer_reviews.text: First purchased the item primarily due to the natural ingredients and sort of on a whim and have bought a refill since because it really works and replaced my regular derma e eye gel. Also, this can be used for your entire face, not just the under-eye area in warmer weather and is never sticky. Great product and very affordable, I recommended this to a couple of my friends and they seem to love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight eye gel with pump up dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I am overall impressed with this product. It has a light cucumber smell & the product dispenses with a pump up design - a thoughtful idea. I love using it before bed, although I do use it in the morning, I feel like I have to wait 20+ minutes for it to fully absorb into my skin before applying any primer or bb cream, or else the products combine and create little balls of residue. I have only been using it for 1 week so still waiting to see if this will provide results- will update
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed. After all the great reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. After all the great reviews, I had high hopes. I received the eye gel a couple of days ago. I tried it at night before I went to bed. In the morning, I didn’t notice much change, so I applied it again (following the day and night directions). To my surprise, my under eye area became very puffy and swollen. It was somewhat alarming. After a while, it did subside, but I purchased this gel to help with my under eye puffiness and this product actually made it worse. The container is very nice and the product feels nice, but unfortunately, it is of no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me, not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my bottle, and saw no results what so ever. When applying, you feel a really cold application and it feels like somethings working, but I saw no difference. I will update this post soon with pictures of my before and after but will be reaching out for a refund because it did not work on me, it may work on you though. I've always had pretty severe dark circles for someone my age and was hoping this would help due to the large amount of positive reviews it had.
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Made me look older
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try on my puffy eyes. Unfortunatleyt, like some have reported, a similar thing happened to me... this product created lines under my eyes only after a few days of use! And it did nothing for the puffiness. Now after months, I can't get off those lines this product has created. Even my husband and friends noticed it!! One line is even quite deep - like I aged instantly! To describe this product as horrible is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: My skin lost its elasticity after using the product
customer_reviews.text: I only had some fine lines under the eyes, so I purchased the eye gel hoping to make them less visible. Initially, the product felt fine. My skin was tighter. However, I stopped using it for a few weeks and my undereye skin was worse than ever. It looks like I aged five years in a couple of weeks. I stopped using the beabody eye gel and I slowly start seeing improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Yota_k

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Eye Gel Product at an Amazing Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye product that I've ever used. It is dispensed with an amazing airtight pump system so you receive the exact amount needed (1-2 gel drops), while reducing waste and preventing oxidation. After several weeks, my under eye bags were gone in the morning. It works on the eyelids as well, and can be used morning and night. It is a quick drying gel and is rapidly absorbed into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Baebody Eye Gel for Under & Around Eyes, 1.7 Ounces
feature_bullets: MORNING & NIGHT EYE GEL: This eye gel helps reduce the appearance of puffiness, dark circles, under eye bags & wrinkles! No more heavy creams, this lightweight gel is the perfect product to awaken your eyes!

HYDRATE & FIRM: Features Peptide Complex to help skin produce collagen, Matrixyl 3000 for smooth fine lines & wrinkles; Vitamin E for moisture & elasticity, plus Jojoba Oil & an Amino Acid Blend for smooth hydration!
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED: Baebody Eye Gel has been allergy and sensitization tested and is a non-irritating, hypoallergenic formula. This clinically-tested eye gel works best if used morning & night.
YOUR HEALTH COMES FIRST TO US: Because your hair, skin & body health comes Before Anyone Else, our natural, safe & effective beauty products are cruelty-free, paraben-free & safe for most skin types.

MEET BAEBODY: We offer a versatile line of skincare cleansers, moisturizers & serums, hair care, carrier oils, body scrubs & wellness products featuring innovative natural ingredients like hyaluronic acid, retinol, argan oil, vitamin c, collagen, tea tree oil and activated charcoal.
